long_description: With the Osprey Pixel Port daypack, staying conected on the go is a snap. A zippered tablet compartment features a clear, touch-sensitive window that lets you operate your tablet without removing it. Zippered tablet compartment; zippered main compartment features organizational pockets and a padded, fleece-lined laptop sleeve fits laptops up to 15 in. Zippered pocket on front flap keeps small items such as phone, wallet and electronics within easy reach. Osprey Pixel Port daypack is made of durable polyester that resists tears and stands up to daily use.
short_description: With the Osprey Pixel Port daypack, staying conected on the go is a snap. A zippered tablet compartment features a clear, touch-sensitive window that lets you operate your tablet without removing it.
